name: Charter Communications, Inc.
description: Charter Communications, Inc. is a leading telecommunications and mass media company in the United States. Founded in 1993, Charter provides high-speed internet, cable television, and telephone services to residential and commercial customers under the Spectrum brand. The company has established itself as a major player in the broadband industry, delivering reliable internet services and a wide range of entertainment options, including on-demand content and live television. With a commitment to innovation, Charter continuously enhances its service offerings, investing in advanced technologies to improve customer experience and enhance connectivity. The company is also focused on expanding its fiber-optic network to meet the increasing demand for high-speed internet access across urban and rural areas. Charter's mission is to connect people and businesses to what matters most, providing essential communication services that empower communities and drive economic growth. As a public company, Charter has prioritized shareholder value while addressing the needs of its customers and the broader community. Its extensive service footprint and diverse product offerings position Charter Communications as a key contributor to the evolution of digital communication in the modern age.
